data.title: Summer Camp 2024
data.meta_description: Everything you need to know about Summer Camp all on one page.
data.text:
R.E.C. Camp

Time Frame: approximately 11-week period (May 28 to August 9), Full Day Camp

Price per Participant: $80 for the time frame above

Description: Participants will enjoy activities, crafts, games, etc. to go along with the theme. There may be field trips and activities planned for all to enjoy. Must have turned 5 on or before 9/1/2023.

Camp Theme: Time Travelers

April 22, 2024 6pm: Residents Online Only

April 23, 2024 6pm: Residents Online and In Person

April 29, 2024 6pm: Residents and Non-Residents Online and In Person

Specialty Camp

Time Frame: 3 days up to 1 week Half Day or Full Day Camp

Price per Participant: Varies by Camp

Description: Specialty camps are really just that. Participants will spend the designated time frame enjoying an in-depth exploration of their chosen specialized activity, to include anything from Arts (Visual and Theatre), Sports, and Aquatics related themes.

April 15, 2024 6pm: Residents and Non-Residents Online

April 16, 2024 6pm: Residents and Non-Residents Online and In Person
